STI.P: Notification of registration of a European social entrepreneurship funds (EuSEF) manager or update of information already notified

IMG.CNT.P: Notification of registration by (name of the Authority) of EuSEF manager or update of information already notified
The (name of the authority of the home Member State) notifies that:
with the following contact details (registered address of the manager)

is registered by (name of the authority) in accordance with Article 15(2) of Regulation (EU) No 346/2013 to manage the funds indicated in the table below. The manager intends to market the EuSEF in the Member States indicated in the table below.
Please indicate if you are notifying amendments to information already provided in a previous notification: Yes No
If yes, please specify the information that you would like to amend:
Addition of a new domicile for the establishment of a EuSEF.
Addition of a new Member State where the manager intends to market the EuSEF.
Removal from the national register of EuSEF managers in accordance with Article 22(2)(b) of the EuSEF Regulation (1).

(1) If this is the case, please replace the text after the address of the manager with the following text: ‘has been removed from the national register of EuSEF managers in accordance with Article 22(2)(b) of the EuSEF Regulation’.
